Module openj9.dtfj
Package com.ibm.j9ddr.tools.ddrinteractive.plugins

Class DDRInteractiveClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • com.ibm.j9ddr.tools.ddrinteractive.plugins.DDRInteractiveClassLoader
  • public class DDRInteractiveClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
    DDR Interactive classloader which is responsible for finding all classes specified by the plugins property.

      • PLUGIN_ENV_VAR

        public static final String PLUGIN_ENV_VAR
        The name of the environment variable which will set the plugin search path. An explicitly set system property will override this setting.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
